info.short.title: Info
info.short.intro: An interactive Hollow Knight: Silksong checklist to help you track progress toward 100%.
info.short.save: Your progress is saved automatically in your browser (no account needed).
info.short.optional: Optional elements (Bosses, Fleas) donâ€™t count toward the 100% but you can still track them.
info.short.transfer: Export creates a backup file you can keep; Import restores that file on another device.
info.short.langs: Available in English and Spanish; more languages may be added.
info.short.credits: Fan project made by fans for fans. Team Cherry is not involved.
